PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		France – Paris
QUALIFICATIONS
Master in Business and administration - IFAG Caen 2010
Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Mechanics and automatism - Institut Lemonnier2007
1st year automobile technologies – MontgomeryCollege 2005
Languages
French - fluent
English – fluent
CAREER SUMMARY
Apr 2018 – Present ProXES Group (Stephan Machinery; FrymaKoruma; Terlet)- Lognes- 77185- FRANCE
Position: Sales Engineer Export Africa
As a company specialized in food processing, pharmaceutical, and health-care technologies, his responsibilities include:
Development of a blank customer portfolio in West Africa (50% of traveling to Nigeria, Cameroon, Senegal, Ghana and Ivory Coast). Researching and identifying potential customers based on the target market.
Management of agents for Ouest Africa
Active business development, providing technical quotes (long sales cycle: 6 to 12 months), mastery of the various processes of building an offer with risk analysis, monitoring of projects until the commissioning and start-up of the line.
Project management with a project average of €500K
Organizing technical equipment trials, running equipment checks and trials to ensure safety and effectiveness.
Identifying sales possibilities and meeting the sales objectives as set
2019 objective was €1.4M / achieved €2.8M
2020 objective was €1.5M / achieved €1.6<
2021 objective was €1.6M / achieved €4.5M
Jan 2015 – Apr 2018 Parimix-Rueil Malmaison -92500 -FRANCE
Position: Sales Engineer
As a company specialized in the sale of industrial machinery for diverse industries including the agricultural and petrochemistry sectors, his responsibilities were:
Overseeing any tender response process and providing technical quotes and estimates (dimensioning based upon on density and concentration levels, viscosity, and product grain size).
Ability to quickly understand the client and system needs by working closely with the company sales and engineering teams, collaborating promotions and customer support.
Providing updates on products and services to clients and company management In-house training received on product line specifications.
Organizing technical equipment demos, running equipment checks and trials to ensure safety and effectiveness.
Researching and identifying potential customers based on the target market.
Recommending various improved materials or machinery to customers and clients by performing a cost performance analysis.
Project management with a project average of 100K€
Identifying sale possibilities and meeting the sales objectives as set :
2015 objective was 300K€ / achieved 350K€
2016 objective was 400K€ / achieved 450K€
2017 objective was 500K€ / achieved 600K€
Oct 2010 - Dec 2014 Motorsport Technician (We created the company with my associate in 2010 and sold it in 2014) Bayeux-FRANCE
Position: Director
Company bought by the 6th largest European car dealership (Mary Group)
Company specialized in the sale of motorcycles, equipment, and lifestyle apparel, as well as repair of motorcycles.
5 employees - Sales revenue: 350 K in 2011, 500 K in 2012, 600 K in 2013.
Purchasing manager for physical and online stores (sunwear-shop.com)
B2B supplier relationship manager
Management of the motorbike workshop, assessment & monitoring of the mechanics’ objectives Communication manager for local and nationwide markets
Sep 2009 - Aug 2010 SNCF (French National Railway Company) Caen-14000-FRANCE
Position: Marketing Manager
Communication manager
In charge of designing sales brochures and providing website updates.
Contributed to the creation of a sales department within the INFRALOG National division
COMMENT
Results oriented business leader with 7 years of experience as a sales engineer, 4 years in management and entrepreneurship and over 10 years living abroad (Mali, Sénégal and USA)
Leadership skills with strong ability to coordinate large-scale projects and teams
Ensuring customer satisfaction in compliance with internal procedure and client requirements with an emphasis on building lasting relationships
Excellent organizational, public speaking and training skills in English and French
Technical skills acquired through an educational and professional background
Looking to apply dedication knowledge and ingenuity to an international company
Skills
Sales
A natural challenger in sales who enjoys solutions sales and the relationships that form while earning my customers trust
Management
Project management skills (establishing and managing new partnerships; calculation of pricing based on client needs; monitoring progress and implementing changes to achieve outputs
Technical Skills
Technical skills acquired through education and preofesional background
Technical knowledge of the field
Technologies
Proficient in Microsoft Windows, Office Software, Solidworks, Sales Force
Personality Traits
High-achiever & Team leader
Hardworking and detailed-oriented
Responsible and dedicated
Ambitious
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk
